casebody.data:
EMILIA MEZRIOUI v. NORMAN E. WHITNEY ET AL. (AC 24047)

Flynn, Bishop and McLachlan, Js.

Argued April 1 — officially released April 5, 20041

April 5, 2004, the date that this decision was released as a slip opinion, is the operative date for all substantive and procedural purposes.

 Per Curiam.

After a careful review of the pleadings, briefs, record and the memorandum of decision in this case, we affirm the thoughtful decision of the trial court.

The judgment is affirmed.
